===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|i}}: a tree ({{zh-l|*木}}) with its top highlighted with an extra stroke, implying the meaning of “apex”; contrast {{zh-l|*本}}. (Alternatively, with fully developed fruit; contrast {{zh-l|*未}}.)
